item.title: Kottke: WebOS
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Kottke posted some ideas on how the WebOS will develop. It’s an interesting read that looks at the development of a WebOS from the point of view of Google, Yahoo, Mozilla, Microsoft and Apple. No matter how the details play out, I’d expect all of the players involved to fight pretty hard to for their […]
item.content:encoded: Kottke posted some ideas on how the WebOS will develop. It’s an interesting read that looks at the development of a WebOS from the point of view of Google, Yahoo, Mozilla, Microsoft and Apple. No matter how the details play out, I’d expect all of the players involved to fight pretty hard to for their share of the market. This will be most true of Microsoft, who has the most resources to fight with and has the most to loose.
